discourse_list.title: Standard Interface fro graph alike data

content.content: HI all, I’m wondering if some sort of standard interface has been previously discussed. I think the introduction of (directed) graphs as a way to implement smart-contract logic has the potential to simplify the development of many network-of-value scenarios.
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing a standard interface for graph-like data to simplify the development of network-of-value scenarios. The post is asking if such a standard interface has been previously discussed. A 3rd party is giving constructive criticism by suggesting that the proposal needs more details and asking questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
